page.title: 15CREST MOTEL
page.content: During 1985 a leisure complex is being built at the Crest Hotel and when complete it will include a swimming pool,sauna,solarium,gymnasium and games room with pool and snooker tables.The other facilities at the hotel include a bar,coffee lounge and restaurante which is open to the general public.Apart from providing these recreational facilities the hotel is an important conference centre in the area.It has sevsral conference rooms of different sizes which can cater for from two to two hundred people.these are mostly used for weddings,social events and business meetings and attracts people from all over the country.Southampton and Everton football clubs have used the conference facilities and in 1983 the Prime Minister held a conservative party conference there.
